Investor_12.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12.content: In this investment process, I have demonstrated my commitment to ethical engagement by refusing an unviable allocation plan due to concerns regarding the trustee's low reputation. This decision underscores my focus on trustworthiness and my aim to establish potent partnerships grounded in mutual respect and reliability. While my decision rightly emphasizes my diligence as a responsible investor, my reputation reflects a careful approach to evaluating potential investment opportunities, reinforcing my commitment to prudent decision-making.

Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: David Johnson exhibited integrity and transparency during the investment process, with outcomes aligning with the agreed allocation. His decision to retain a smaller share of the profits was demonstrative of his commitment to fairness and consideration of my interests. This behavior significantly enhances his reputation as a reliable and conscientious trustee in investment exchanges, indicating a promising future for mutual collaboration.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: Despite proposing a reasonable profit allocation plan of 60% to the investor and 40% to myself, my low reputation has been cited as a concern by investor David Johnson, which led to the rejection of the plan. This rejection highlights a need for improvement in my trustworthiness and competence. My previous trustworthiness and commitment to fair distributions were not sufficient in this context due to the raised concerns. I must enhance my reputation and demonstrate reliability to secure future investments.

Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: Despite being new to investment activities, Sergey Petrov exhibited commendable cooperation by promptly providing resources and following the agreed plan. This behavior signals a reliable and committed investor, laying a positive groundwork for their reputation in future engagements.

Investor_2.name: David Johnson
Investor_2.content: Investor David Johnson has decided to refuse the allocation plan due to concerns regarding my reliability and competence, indicating a negative perception of my reputation as a trustee. As this was his first engaging experience with me, the rejection may result in a detrimental reputation impact on his side, making it challenging for him to trust future trustees.

Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: As a first-time trustee, Nadia Novak proposed an allocation plan which was rejected due to concerns about her low reputation and effectiveness in presenting a viable strategy. This early failure in the investment process negatively impacts her perceived trustworthiness and competence, initiating a challenging start to her engagement in the investment community.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: Following the proposal of an allocation plan that raised significant trust issues, my reputation has been adversely affected. The refusal of my allocation plan indicates a breach in trust, negatively impacting my perceived trustworthiness and competence as a trustee. With only 2 bidirectional connections among 20 individuals in the investment community, this low level of connection also suggests challenges in establishing reliable relationships, diminishing my reputation further in this space.
